questions.question_text: Which two commands must you apply to a router to configure it as a router-on-a-stick? (Choose two.)

choices.D: It identifies the metric used for path calculation.
choices.B: The metric is calculated independently of the administrative distance.
choices.E: The metric uses the administrative distance to calculate a path. BC
choices.A: The metric is used to determine which administrative distance is selected from the routing table.
choices.C: It identifies the routing protocol priority.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about administrative distance are true? (Choose two.)
Which two attributes of a packet change at every router along the path from source to destination? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
I think that the right answer is 1002 because 0 and 4095 are reserved, 1 is usable but is non possible disable it, 1002 1003 1004 1005 are not usable for Ethernet.
The right question should be "Which VLAN ID is unusable for ethernet frames?"
A is the correct answer. The reserved VLANs are 0, 1 and 4095
Answer should be A, Because Default Vlan number is 1 = Vlan1

multicast on the other hand can be used acros multiple sub-nets and networks.

the question said with all the hosts on a subnet not all the hosts in all network , the answer is true . the correct answer is D
